welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rainhill, a charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer. Happy travels!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport caters to seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
